items.title: ‘We are acquaintances, not friends’: My neighbors need somewhere to stay after a house fire. Do I say yes?
items.description: “We feel obliged to offer our house to this couple to live in while they deal with this horrible experience.”

items.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
items.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

items.title: My husband’s brother left his $600K estate to a friend. Can we contest the will? He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD.
items.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

items.title: Trump signs the Genius Act into law, in significant step for U.S. crypto regulation
items.description: President Trump said the crypto industry was once “mocked and dismissed and counted out,” but now could become a big buyer of U.S. government debt.

items.title: American Express earnings show healthy spending — including on these fancy categories
items.description: Amex saw 7% growth in spending last quarter. Spending on front-of-cabin plane tickets was up even more than that.
